name: Jennifer Middendorf
text: Great pizza and great prices. I love the flavors the put on the crusts. Sometimes you have to wait a little longer than other places with similar prices but that's because Hungry Howie's is serving you fresh, hot pizza, made to order. Unlike Little Caesars which is about the only place that has similar prices & isn't half as good.

name: Khalilah Carlile
text: Ill start it right off by saying the pizza and service there is great. I love the pizza crust! I made a mistake when I ordered and they had now problem fixing it and even offered me a drink while I wait. I can't wait to go back.

text: ALTAMONTE store. They send me a promotion that expires on February 29, 2020. Today I try to make the order with the proper promotion codes for a special price and they do not accept it, they almost tease me and I end up paying a higher price than they advertise. Watch out!

name: Johnny Vo
text: Real cheese and freshly made pizza dough makes this pizza better than most chain restaurants IMHO. The sauce isn't too acidic which helps avoid the heartburn.

text: Best pizza and delivery in the area. Great price. The sub sauce is great on the pizza as well as baked subs. Highly recommend.
